alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 09 at 8:45PM EDT until July 10 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... South Central Lawrence County in western Pennsylvania... * Until 1215 AM EDT. * At 845 PM EDT, local authorities are reporting observed flash flooding in McKee Run, Snake Run, and surrounding creeks and streams. Between 3 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. No additional rainfall is expected. Flash flooding is already occurring and will continue. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... New Beaver and Wampum. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
